title: Balancing Saving Money & Enjoying Life (Hour 3)
description:
George Kamel & Rachel Cruze discuss:

Balancing saving and enjoying life,

What to do with a HELOC,

Disagreeing with a spouse on money,

Paying to get certified in a side hustle.


Support Our Sponsor:
LegacyBox

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
